Description: Lump of glass: of opaque red probably from a crucible. It has a flat base and a smooth side. The rest is of irregular shape and rough.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: H. Coutts, 'Gold of the Pharaohs' (Edinburgh 1988), p. 96 [86]. C. Favard-Meeks in P. Brissaud & C. Zivie-Coche (eds), 'Tanis : travaux récents sur le tell Sân el-Hagar : Mission française des fouilles de Tanis, 1987-1997' (1998), p. 131.
